column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We were also really pleased with the sides.  We ordered three for three people which may be a bit much since they are also generous portions.  My favorite was the brussel sprouts
column2: which were sweet and savory.  The sweet potatoes were also good.  Then the mashed potatoes were buttery and had garlic mixed in--and were the favorite of my brother.  All were perfect compliments to the steak.
